dcterms:description: A heterogeneous graph dataset containing citation information with three types of nodes (papers, authors, conferences) and four types of edges (author-paper, paper-conference, etc.) used for node classification.
dcterms:title: DBLP

dcterms:creator: X. Wang

dcterms:description: A heterogeneous graph dataset containing citation information with three types of nodes (papers, authors, subjects) and four types of edges (author-paper, paper-subject, etc.) used for node classification.
dcterms:title: ACM

dcterms:description: A heterogeneous graph dataset containing movie information with three types of nodes (movies, actors, directors) and labels as genres of movies used for node classification.
dcterms:title: IMDB
